targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  *
FROM crosstab(
    $$SELECT *
    FROM (
        SELECT
          'trades' AS type,
          trade_history_job_statuses.status,
          trade_history_job_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            job_status_types.status,
           COUNT(trade_history_jobs.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::job_status_type)) AS status
            ) job_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN trade_history_jobs ON job_status_types.status = trade_history_jobs.status
          GROUP BY
            job_status_types.status
        ) trade_history_job_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'candles' AS type,
          candle_history_job_statuses.status,
          candle_history_job_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            job_status_types.status,
            COUNT(candle_history_jobs.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::job_status_type)) AS status
            ) job_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN candle_history_jobs ON job_status_types.status = candle_history_jobs.status
          GROUP BY
            job_status_types.status
        ) candle_history_job_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'funding_rates' AS type,
          funding_rate_history_job_statuses.status,
          funding_rate_history_job_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            job_status_types.status,
            COUNT(funding_rate_history_jobs.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::job_status_type)) AS status
            ) job_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN funding_rate_history_jobs ON job_status_types.status = funding_rate_history_jobs.status
          GROUP BY
            job_status_types.status
        ) funding_rate_history_job_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'predicted_funding_rates' AS type,
          predicted_funding_rate_job_statuses.status,
          predicted_funding_rate_job_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            job_status_types.status,
            COUNT(predicted_funding_rate_jobs.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::job_status_type)) AS status
            ) job_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN predicted_funding_rate_jobs ON job_status_types.status = predicted_funding_rate_jobs.status
          GROUP BY
            job_status_types.status
        ) predicted_funding_rate_job_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'lending_rates' AS type,
          lending_rate_history_job_statuses.status,
          lending_rate_history_job_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            job_status_types.status,
            COUNT(lending_rate_history_jobs.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::job_status_type)) AS status
            ) job_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN lending_rate_history_jobs ON job_status_types.status = lending_rate_history_jobs.status
          GROUP BY
            job_status_types.status
        ) lending_rate_history_job_statuses
      ) foo
    ORDER BY foo.type, foo.status;$$
  ) AS ct(type TEXT, "enqueued" BIGINT, "error" BIGINT, "working" BIGINT, "complete" BIGINT, "canceled" BIGINT);

SELECT
  *
FROM crosstab(
    $$SELECT
      job_chunks.*
    FROM (
        SELECT
          'trades' AS type,
          trade_history_chunk_statuses.status,
          trade_history_chunk_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            chunk_status_types.status,
           COUNT(trade_history_chunks.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::chunk_status_type)) AS status
            ) chunk_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN trade_history_chunks ON chunk_status_types.status = trade_history_chunks.status
          GROUP BY
            chunk_status_types.status
        ) trade_history_chunk_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'candles' AS type,
          candle_history_chunk_statuses.status,
          candle_history_chunk_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            chunk_status_types.status,
            COUNT(candle_history_chunks.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::chunk_status_type)) AS status
            ) chunk_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN candle_history_chunks ON chunk_status_types.status = candle_history_chunks.status
          GROUP BY
            chunk_status_types.status
        ) candle_history_chunk_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'funding_rates' AS type,
          funding_rate_history_chunk_statuses.status,
          funding_rate_history_chunk_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            chunk_status_types.status,
            COUNT(funding_rate_history_chunks.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::chunk_status_type)) AS status
            ) chunk_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN funding_rate_history_chunks ON chunk_status_types.status = funding_rate_history_chunks.status
          GROUP BY
            chunk_status_types.status
        ) funding_rate_history_chunk_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'predicted_funding_rates' AS type,
          predicted_funding_rate_chunk_statuses.status,
          predicted_funding_rate_chunk_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            chunk_status_types.status,
            COUNT(predicted_funding_rate_chunks.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::chunk_status_type)) AS status
            ) chunk_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN predicted_funding_rate_chunks ON chunk_status_types.status = predicted_funding_rate_chunks.status
          GROUP BY
            chunk_status_types.status
        ) predicted_funding_rate_chunk_statuses
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
          'lending_rates' AS type,
          lending_rate_history_chunk_statuses.status,
          lending_rate_history_chunk_statuses.count
        FROM (
          SELECT
            chunk_status_types.status,
            COUNT(lending_rate_history_chunks.status) AS count
          FROM (SELECT
              unnest(enum_range(NULL::chunk_status_type)) AS status
            ) chunk_status_types
          LEFT OUTER JOIN lending_rate_history_chunks ON chunk_status_types.status = lending_rate_history_chunks.status
          GROUP BY
            chunk_status_types.status
        ) lending_rate_history_chunk_statuses
      ) job_chunks
    ORDER BY job_chunks.type, job_chunks.status;$$
  ) AS ct (type TEXT, enqueued BIGINT, error BIGINT, working BIGINT, not_found BIGINT, complete BIGINT, canceled BIGINT);
